item.title: Government shutdown live updates: Senate approves short-term government funding bill
item.description: The federal government was set to run out of money Friday night.

item.title: 2 dead, nearly 70 injured when car plows into German Christmas market: Officials
item.description: A car plowed into people at a Christmas market in Magdeburg, Germany, on Friday, killing at least two people and injuring dozens more, officials said.

item.title: How did Washington end up on another shutdown precipice?

item.title: WATCH: Dwayne Johnson wakes up to his toenails painted -- then finds the culprit
item.description: Johnson posted a video to his Instagram of him waking up to his toenails being painted. Turns out, the person -- or elf -- who did it was caught red-h...

item.title: Flames billow after military helicopter makes emergency landing on Camp Pendleton
item.description: A military helicopter made an emergency landing on Camp Pendleton, California Highway Patrol said in a statement.
